text:
DC - I suspect this must be something at the BF end. I've just checked my TPD feed for Fri & Sat and found dropouts for most races, notably that last one at Bath 1.229665871 where your two apps had different feeds. RRC messages for me stop after 21:01:10, resume at 21:01:21, stop again at 21:01:52, then resume again at 21:02:09 - that looks to tally exactly with your first chart. RP messages actually also drop out from 21:01:16 to 21:01:26 for me on that one.

Strangely the 20:45 Lingfield race that you had issues with but Mo didn't was fine for me as well.

The races I had dropouts on were: Fri - Bath 18:15/18:45/19:50/21:00 Sat - Lingfield 17:45/18:15/18:45/19:45/20:45 Bangor 16:35/17:10 Chepstow 18:00/19:30 (no inplay data at all for that one !!)/21:00

My implementation is C#, I don't set conflate (or heartbeat) and run my app from London

text: OK thanks <@U01335QG2G3> this pretty much nails it down as not my code that is the problem, If nothing else this helps me no longer waste time trying to find problems in my code!
